夜鳴き: (よなき) - crying or singing (of bird, etc.) at night
夜鳴き蕎麦: (よなきそば) - ambulatory evening vendor of noodles (or the noodles themselves)
夜鷹: (ヨタカ) - grey nightjar (Caprimulgus indicus); nightjar (any bird of family Caprimulgidae)/goatsucker; (夜鷹 only) streetwalker/low class prostitute (Edo period); (夜鷹 only)   soba vendors who walk around at night/soba sold by these vendors
夜鷹蕎麦: (よたかそば) - ambulatory evening vendor of noodles (or the noodles themselves)
夢々: (ゆめゆめ) - (努努, 努々 only) (usu. in expressions of prohibition) certainly/absolutely; (usu. with negative verb forms) (not even) a little bit; diligently; (夢夢, 夢々 only) dreams
夢うつつ: (ゆめうつつ) - half asleep and half awake/trance; dream and reality
夢か現か: (ゆめかうつつか) - feeling as if in a dream
夢にも: (ゆめにも) - not in the slightest; not in one's wildest dreams
夢のまた夢: (ゆめのまたゆめ) - beyond one's wildest dreams; dream within a dream
夢の又夢: (ゆめのまたゆめ) - beyond one's wildest dreams; dream within a dream
夢を結ぶ: (ゆめをむすぶ) - to sleep; to fall asleep
夢を見る: (ゆめをみる) - to dream; to have a dream
夢オチ: (ゆめオチ) - "it was all a dream"-ending
夢中: (muchuu) - absorto em, imerso em, louco por, obcecado por, dedicado a; esquecendo-se de si mesmo, atordoamento, transe, êxtase, delírio; absorvido em, imerso em, louco por, obcecado por, dedicado a; esquecendo-se de si mesmo, atordoamento, transe, êxtase, delírio; dentro de um sonho, enquanto sonha
夢中遊行症: (むちゅうゆうこうしょう) - somnambulism; sleepwalking
夢判断: (ゆめはんだん) - interpretation of dreams/dream reading/oneirocriticism/oneiroscopy; The Interpretation of Dreams (book by Sigmund Freud, 1900)
夢占い: (ゆめうらない) - oneiromancy; dream fortune-telling
夢夢: (ゆめゆめ) - (努努, 努々 only) (usu. in expressions of prohibition) certainly/absolutely; (usu. with negative verb forms) (not even) a little bit; diligently; (夢夢, 夢々 only) dreams
夢巨頭: (ユメゴンドウ) - pygmy killer whale (Feresa attenuata)
夢幻: (ゆめまぼろし) - dreams; fantasy; visions
夢幻泡沫: (むげんほうまつ) - (yoji) transient; ephemeral; fleeting; evanescent
夢心地: (ゆめごこち) - dreamy state of mind; ecstasy; trance
夢日記: (ゆめにっき) - dream journal; dream diary
夢枕: (ゆめまくら) - at the bedside where one dreams
夢枕に立つ: (ゆめまくらにたつ) - to appear in one's dream
夢物語: (ゆめものがたり) - account of a dream; fantastic story/wild tale/empty dream/pipe dream
夢現: (ゆめうつつ) - half asleep and half awake/trance; dream and reality
夢落ち: (ゆめおち) - "it was all a dream"-ending
夢見心地: (ゆめみごこち) - dreamy state of mind
夢語り: (ゆめがたり) - account of a dream; fantastic story/wild tale/empty dream/pipe dream
夢違え: (ゆめたがえ) - act of praying or performing an incantation so that a bad dream does not come true
夢魔: (むま) - nightmare; incubus/succubus/demon appearing in a dream
夥しい: (おびただしい) - large number; innumerable; great many; immense; vast; abundant
大々的: (だいだいてき) - great; grand; extensive; large-scale
大々神楽: (だいだいかぐら) - grand kagura performance at Ise
大あり: (おおあり) - plentiful; abundant; definitely extant
大あわて: (おおあわて) - great haste; mad rush
大い: (おおい) - (also written as 正)  greater (of equal court ranks)/upper/senior; a great deal/very much
大いに: (おおいに) - very; much; greatly; a lot of
大いに喜ぶ: (おおいによろこぶ) - to be highly pleased
大いばり: (おおいばり) - bragging; showing off; pride
大き: (おおき) - great/grand/large; (also written as 正)  greater (of equal court ranks)/upper/senior; a great deal/very much
大きい: (おおきい) - big; large; great; loud
大きく: (ookiku) - em grande estilo, em grande escala
大きく水をあけて: (おおきくみずをあけて) - by a comfortable margin
大きさ引継ぎ配列: (おおきさひきつぎはいれつ) - assumed-size array
大きすぎる: (おおきすぎる) - to be oversized (overloud, etc.)
大きなお世話: (おおきなおせわ) - None of your business!; Don't bother me!
大きな顔をする: (おおきなかおをする) - to look as if one is important; to swagger around
大きに: (おおきに) - greatly/very much; (abbr. of おおきにありがとう) thanks a lot
大きに御世話だ: (おおきにおせわだ) - It's none of your business
大きめ: (おおきめ) - largish; biggish; a little bit larger
大き目: (おおきめ) - largish; biggish; a little bit larger
大き過ぎる: (おおきすぎる) - to be oversized (overloud, etc.)
大げんか: (おおげんか) - quarrel; huge fight; big row
大ざっぱ: (おおざっぱ) - rough (as in not precise); broad; sketchy
大しけ: (おおしけ) - very stormy weather (at sea); very poor catch of fish (due to stormy seas)
大した: (たいした) - considerable; great; important; significant; a big deal
大した事ではない: (たいしたことではない) - trivial; not amounting to much
大した事では無い: (たいしたことではない) - trivial; not amounting to much
大した事ない: (たいしたことない) - trivial; not amounting to much
大した事無い: (たいしたことない) - trivial; not amounting to much
大ぜい: (たいぜい) - many; crowd; great number of people
大それた: (だいそれた) - outrageous; monstrous; appalling; inordinate; overambitious
大っぴら: (おおっぴら) - (often as 大っぴらに) open; public; overt; free; unreserved; uninhibited
大つごもり: (おおつごもり) - the last day of the year; New Year's Eve
大とろ: (おおとろ) - quality tuna; fat under-belly of tuna
